participant_1.background:
I spend my spare time doing solitary activities like reading and hiking.
I had to move across country for my job.
i am a petsitter.
I love my job as an accountant, but I can't stand heights.
I call my family to catch up and hear about their days.

participant_2.background:
I am not really into social media, I think blogs are more my style.
My clumsy ways will be met with criticism from others, but my dog will always be there for me.
I start working with my brother in law in Hollywood.
as long as i have a cup of coffee in my hand i am a happy person.
i don t have a lot of family members that i like.

content.text: Hi there, how are you today?
I'm great, thanks for asking! I just had a great morning with my dog. What about you?
I'm doing well, thanks! I'm getting ready to head to work. Do you work?
I do! I'm a writer for a blog. What do you do for work?
I'm an accountant. It's not my favorite thing to do, but it pays the bills.
I see. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, hike, and spend time with my family. How about you?
I love to blog, spend time with my dog, and drink coffee. I'm not really into social media, but I love blogs.
That's great! I'm not really into social media either. I guess we're both a bit old-fashioned.
Haha, I guess so! What's your favorite thing to read?
I love to read fiction. I'm a big fan of fantasy and science fiction.
Me too! I love getting lost in a good book.
I know, right? It's the best
